BuckleScript bindings for Lottie for React Native
make
contents: make source option progress option float option bool option bool option BsReactNative Style t option resizeMode option string option bool option bool array ReasonReact reactElement ReasonReact component ReasonReact stateless ReasonReact noRetainedProps ReasonReact actionless source progress speed autoPlay loop style resizeMode imageAssetsFolder hardwareAccelerationAndroid enableMergePathsAndroidForKitKatAndAbove
rendered: let make = ( ~source: source, ~?progress: option(progress), ~?speed: option(float), ~?autoPlay: option(bool), ~?loop: option(bool), ~?style: option(BsReactNative.Style.t), ~?resizeMode: option(resizeMode), ~?imageAssetsFolder: option(string), ~?hardwareAccelerationAndroid: option(bool), ~?enableMergePathsAndroidForKitKatAndAbove: option( bool ), array( ReasonReact.reactElement ) ) => ReasonReact.component( ReasonReact.stateless, ReasonReact.noRetainedProps, ReasonReact.actionless )

title: resizeMode

title: progress
contents: progress BsReactNative Animated Value t float
rendered: type progress = | Animated(BsReactNative.Animated.Value.t) | Float(float)

title: source
contents: source string animationObject BsReactNative Packager required string
